props.name: tableValues
props.desc: When type table, the list of <number>, separated by white space and/or a comma, which define the lookup table. An empty list results in an identity transfer function. If the attribute is not specified, then the effect is as if an empty list were provided.

props.name: slope
props.desc:
When type linear, the slope of the linear function.

The lacuna value is 1.

props.name: intercept
props.desc:
When type linear, the intercept of the linear function.

The lacuna value is 0.

props.name: amplitude
props.desc:
When type gamma, the amplitude of the gamma function.

The lacuna value is 1.

props.name: exponent
props.desc:
When type gamma, the exponent of the gamma function.

The lacuna value is 1.

props.name: offset
props.desc:
When type gamma, the offset of the gamma function.

The lacuna value is 0.
